ComicInfo.Inker: Dick Briefer,Mike Royer,Joe Sinnott,Rudy Nebres,Ricardo Villamonte,Ernie Chan
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T01:09:59 [Issue ID 4000-178624] urn:comicvine:4000-178624 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 21:51:34. [Issue ID 767624]
ComicInfo.Summary: The passing of Gordon Pruett allows the monolith to bring the New Seed into existence. The New Seed travels the universe, first seeing the death of life on one planet and helping life begin on another planet.
ComicInfo.Title: La nouvelle semence; La saga de Triton; Kull et le cyclope des abîmes
